Package index

All functions

available_labels()
A list of the available Alaska area labels (900 +!)
available_shapefiles()
A list of the available shapefiles from MACEReports
build_biomass_at_age_table_summer_goa()
Create biomass at age table for MACE summer GOA cruise reports
build_biomass_at_age_table_winter_goa()
Create biomass at age table for MACE winter cruise reports
build_biomass_at_length_table_summer_goa()
Create biomass at length table for MACE summer GOA cruise reports
build_biomass_at_length_table_winter_goa()
Create biomass at length table for MACE winter GOA cruise reports
build_catch_table_summer_goa()
Create trawl catch table for MACE summer GOA cruise reports
build_haul_table()
Create trawl haul effort table for MACE cruise reports
build_nmfs_area_totals_table()
Create pollock biomass and numbers per NMFS management area table for MACE GOA summer cruise reports
build_numbers_at_age_table_summer_goa()
Create numbers at age table for MACE summer GOA cruise reports
build_numbers_at_age_table_winter_goa()
Create numbers at age table for MACE winter cruise reports
build_numbers_at_length_table_summer_goa()
Create numbers at length table for MACE summer GOA cruise reports
build_numbers_at_length_table_winter_goa()
Create numbers at length table for MACE winter cruise reports
build_sf_sticks()
Build stick objects from xyz (lat/long/abundance) data for use in stickplots
build_shelikof_pre_selectivity_corrected_biomass_age_table()
Create the old 'pre-selectivity era' biomass at age summary table for winter MACE cruise reports
build_shelikof_pre_selectivity_corrected_biomass_length_table()
Create the old 'pre-selectivity era' biomass at length table for winter MACE cruise reports
build_shelikof_pre_selectivity_corrected_num_age_table()
Create the old 'pre-selectivity era' numbers at age table for winter MACE cruise reports
build_shelikof_pre_selectivity_corrected_num_length_table()
Create the old 'pre-selectivity era' numbers at length table for winter MACE cruise reports
build_specimen_table_summer_goa()
Create biological specimen table for MACE summer GOA cruise reports
build_stick_legend()
Return a legend that can be added to stickplots
build_ts_relationships_table()
Create the standard MACE target strength relationships table
easy_plot_limits()
Set your ggplot map limits a bit more easily
get_area_labels()
Return Alaska area labels for plotting
get_basemap_layers()
Create a MACE-themed basemap
get_interpolated_color_bins()
Return logical breaks that can be used to plot abundance values
get_interpolated_plot_vals()
Return predicted biomass values that can be plotted in interpolated abundance and distribution maps
get_shapefile()
Return shapefiles that are used in MACEReports
plot_biomass_nums_by_age()
Get biomass- and numbers- by age plots with dual y-axis
plot_biomass_nums_by_length()
Get biomass- and numbers- by length plots with dual y-axis
plot_historical_age_comps_bubbleplot()
Bubbleplot of the historical numbers- and biomass- at age for the survey timeseries.
plot_historical_biomass_nums_length_ridges()
Plot 'ridgelines' comparing the survey timeseries biomass and numbers at length.
plot_length_and_weight_at_age()
Plot mean fish length- and weight- at age for the current survey, with historical length- and weight- at age for context.
plot_weight_at_length()
Plot mean fish weight at length for the current survey, with historical weight at length context.
shelikof_biomass
An example dataset consisting of pollock biomass values at length on a per-interval basis.
shelikof_sst
An example dataset consisting of sea surface temperatures.

Developed by Mike Levine.
